title: PM due in KP to kick off under-21 games, distribute Kafalat cards
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 9 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan is scheduled to visit Peshawar today to inaugurate the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Under-21 games being participated by the players from all 35 districts.
Later, the prime minister would visit Mohmand District where he would distribute Kafalat cards among the deserving people under anti-poverty initiative of Ehsaas programme, according to a PM office press release.
Moreover, he would also address a public gathering there.
